mapper.sql: ROW_ID, MD_NAME, MD_CODE,PARENT_ROWID, SELECTED_FLAG, MD_NEW_NAME, SHOW_SEQUENCE, MD_URL, IS_SYSTEM_MD,HAVE_CHILD, INTRANET_FLAG, OASYS_FLAG, ACTIVE_FLAG, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_BY,LAST_UPDATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_COUNT, ATTRIBUTE01, ATTRIBUTE02
mapper.select:
select
from MD_MODULE where PARENT_ROWID = #{parentRowid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ACTIVE_FLAG = '1' ORDER BY SHOW_SEQUENCE ASC
mapper.insert: insert into MD_MODULE (ROW_ID, MD_NAME, MD_CODE, PARENT_ROWID, SELECTED_FLAG, MD_NEW_NAME, SHOW_SEQUENCE, MD_URL, IS_SYSTEM_MD, HAVE_CHILD, INTRANET_FLAG, OASYS_FLAG, ACTIVE_FLAG, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_COUNT, ATTRIBUTE01, ATTRIBUTE02) values (#{rowId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mdName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mdCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentRowid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selectedFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mdNewName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{showSequence,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mdUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isSystemMd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{haveChild,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{intranetFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{oasysFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{activeFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{attribute01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute02,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
